metadata.name: Apo prucalopride 1 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in thrombocytopenia

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of pulmonary toxicity can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Cyclophosphamide
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vindesine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vinorelbine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vincristine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vinblastine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vintafolide
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vinflunine
The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Thrombopoietin is combined with Vincamine
